name: Icebreak
description:
Fight, blow up, and rebuild! Endless waves of enemies have come to attack your lonely iceberg in the middle of the sea and it's up to you to hold them off. Plan out your moves, navigate the thinning ice, and see how long you and your iceberg can last!

Controls

Move: Arrow keys or WASD

Push: Z or I

Put down bomb: X or O

Rebuild broken ice: C or P

Restart: R

Quit: Escape
